title: So You Want A SUPER Fast NVMe Drive For Gaming?
description: I test a super fast SSD against other stuff for gaming and then put it in a USB dock to see how much performance you lose.  WD_BLACK NVMe SSD:  Lexar NVMe SSD:  WD Greet Sata SSD:   The Seagate and Samsung drives are no longer available.
